#### The purpose of this notebook is to read data from Harmoised layer and build a view & table for Power BI use.

**Author**                         **Created Date**                **Description**  
Prathap Adicherla         01-April-2025             Fact Absence view :

Combining sickness-related absences (with additional sickness details like duration and classification) with non-sickness absences

Calculating standardized leave metrics (Leave_ONS) based on work schedules

Providing a comprehensive dataset for absence analysis, including type, duration, and work schedule adjustments

from pyspark.sql.functions import udf, col, lit, when, coalesce, concat, sum, avg, max, min, count, countDistinct, date_format, to_date, datediff, months_between, year, month,  hour, minute, second, expr, asc, desc
from pyspark.sql.types import DateType, TimestampType, StringType, IntegerType, FloatType, DoubleType, BooleanType, StructType, StructField, ArrayType, MapType
from pyspark.sql.window import Window
from pyspark.sql.functions import row_number, rank, dense_rank, lag, lead, ntile
from pyspark.sql import SQLContext
from pyspark.sql import DataFrame
from pyspark.sql import functions as F
from pyspark.sql.avro.functions import from_avro, to_avro
from pyspark.sql.streaming import DataStreamReader, DataStreamWriter
from pyspark.sql.utils import AnalysisException
from pyspark.sql.catalog import Catalog
from pyspark.sql.column import Column
from pyspark.sql.group import GroupedData
from pyspark.sql.pandas.functions import pandas_udf

from datetime import datetime, timedelta
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

try:
    logInfo("Starting HR Fact Absence All setup")
    
    # Get storage account 
    storage_account = mssparkutils.notebook.run('/utils/py_utils_get_storage_account')
    logInfo(f"Using storage account: {storage_account}")
    
    # Fix the path
    storage_account = storage_account.rstrip('/')
    delta_table_path = f"abfss://odw-curated@{storage_account}/saphr/pbi_fact_absence_all"
    logInfo(f"Delta table will be created at: {delta_table_path}")
    
    # Create/refresh view
    logInfo("Creating view odw_curated_db.vw_fact_absence_all")
    spark.sql("""
    CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_curated_db.vw_fact_absence_all AS
    SELECT
        faa.absencedate,
        CAST(faa.absencehours AS FLOAT) AS absencehours,  -- Explicitly cast to FLOAT
        faa.staffnumber,
        faa.WorkScheduleRule,
        faa.AbsType,
        faa.SicknessGroup,
        faa.AttendanceorAbsenceType,
        faa.Leave,
        CASE DAYOFWEEK(absencedate)
            WHEN 2 THEN ws.Mo/7.4  -- Monday
            WHEN 3 THEN ws.Tu/7.4   -- Tuesday
            WHEN 4 THEN ws.We/7.4   -- Wednesday
            WHEN 5 THEN ws.Th/7.4   -- Thursday
            WHEN 6 THEN ws.Fr/7.4   -- Friday
            ELSE NULL
        END AS Leave_ONS,
        faa.PSGroup,
        faa.PersonnelArea,
        faa.PersonnelSubarea,
        fas.sickness_id,
        fas.Days AS sicknesslength,
        CASE
            WHEN fas.Days > 20.0 THEN 'long-term'
            ELSE 'short-term'
        END AS sicknesslengthtype
    FROM
        odw_harmonised_db.sap_hr_fact_absence_all faa
        LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sap_hr_fact_absence_sickness fas ON faa.staffnumber = fas.StaffNumber
        LEFT JOIN odw_standardised_db.work_schedules ws ON faa.WorkScheduleRule = ws.WorkScheduleRule
    WHERE
        faa.AttendanceorAbsenceType = 'Sickness'
        AND
        faa.absencedate BETWEEN fas.sickness_start AND fas.sickness_end
    
    UNION
    
    SELECT
        faa.absencedate,
        CAST(faa.absencehours AS FLOAT) AS absencehours,  -- Explicitly cast to FLOAT
        faa.staffnumber,
        faa.WorkScheduleRule,
        faa.AbsType,
        faa.SicknessGroup,
        faa.AttendanceorAbsenceType,
        faa.Leave,
        CASE DAYOFWEEK(absencedate)
            WHEN 2 THEN ws.Mo/7.4  -- Monday
            WHEN 3 THEN ws.Tu/7.4   -- Tuesday
            WHEN 4 THEN ws.We/7.4   -- Wednesday
            WHEN 5 THEN ws.Th/7.4   -- Thursday
            WHEN 6 THEN ws.Fr/7.4   -- Friday
            ELSE NULL
        END AS Leave_ONS,
        faa.PSGroup,
        faa.PersonnelArea,
        faa.PersonnelSubarea,
        NULL AS sickness_id,
        NULL AS sicknesslength,
        NULL AS sicknesslengthtype
    FROM
        odw_harmonised_db.sap_hr_fact_absence_all faa
        LEFT JOIN odw_standardised_db.work_schedules ws ON faa.WorkScheduleRule = ws.WorkScheduleRule
    WHERE
        faa.AttendanceorAbsenceType <> 'Sickness'
    """)
    logInfo("Successfully created view odw_curated_db.vw_fact_absence_all")
    
    # Drop the table if it exists
    logInfo("Dropping table odw_curated_db.pbi_fact_absence_all if it exists")
    spark.sql("""
    DROP TABLE IF EXISTS odw_curated_db.pbi_fact_absence_all
    """)
    logInfo("Table dropped or did not exist")
    
    # Create table from view with specified location and explicit casting
    logInfo("Creating table odw_curated_db.pbi_fact_absence_all from view with specified location")
    spark.sql(f"""
    CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE odw_curated_db.pbi_fact_absence_all
    USING delta
    LOCATION '{delta_table_path}'
    AS 
    SELECT 
        absencedate,
        CAST(absencehours AS DOUBLE) AS absencehours,  -- Explicitly cast to DOUBLE
        staffnumber,
        WorkScheduleRule,
        AbsType,
        SicknessGroup,
        AttendanceorAbsenceType,
        Leave,
        Leave_ONS,
        PSGroup,
        PersonnelArea,
        PersonnelSubarea,
        sickness_id,
        sicknesslength,
        sicknesslengthtype
    FROM odw_curated_db.vw_fact_absence_all
    """)
    
    logInfo("HR Fact Absence All setup completed successfully")

except Exception as e:
    logError(f"Error in HR Fact Absence All setup: {str(e)}")
    logException(e)
    raise e
finally:
    logInfo("Flushing logs")
    flushLogging()
